name: FiveM Stats

GITHUB_LINK.description: Used for Update Checks and Notifications | DO NOT CHANGE THIS

RESOURCE_REPO.description: Used for Update Checks and Notifications | DO NOT CHANGE THIS

PROJECT_NAME.description: Used for Update Checks and Notifications | DO NOT CHANGE THIS

MONGO.description: Your Mongo DB Connection String | Example: mongodb://admin:PassWord@SG-StatsBot.servers.mongodirector.com:27017/admin

READY_LOGS.description: Discord Channel ID to send Update Notifications to (These are sent when the bot starts)
